title: Arcade Sona auras effects missing?
body:
I bought **Arcade Sona** on sale on Tuesday and I immediately noticed it was **visually bugged**. I was wondering why in the skin spotlight the aura range indicators (the circle) have their proper 'arcade' effects (the tiny **pixel rectangles** that you can see in the autoattacks too) while in the live version no effect is displayed in the aura (the big blue-green-purple circle) around Sona. I'm sure it's a bug. You feel like playing Classic Sona with another model... Which shouldn't be, I guess?

**However, if I play with other people, they can see the proper effects**. But it's not a problem of my computer because I logged in from a friend's pc, and the problem persists. **I play on EUW but I think the problem is general.**

Without the pixel rectangles it really feels like something's missing.

I attached three screenshots to display her Q, her W and her E. The ult is fine.

I was wondering if anybody else was experiencing the problem, and if yes, please feel free to post in this thread I created in the bug section, for Sona <3
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/JWbrGEVE-client-arcade-sona-bugged
